div.p: title: COVID-19 Patient Impact & Hospital Capacity

description: CDC, NHSN COVID-19 Patient Impact & Hospital Capacity Hospital Bed/ICU/Ventilator Capacity. The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention’s (CDC’s) National Healthcare Safety Network (NHSN) is supporting the nation’s COVID-19 response by introducing a new COVID-19 Patient Impact and Hospital Capacity Module within NHSN’s Patient Safety Component. https://www.cdc.gov/nhsn/acute-care-hospital/covid19/index.html
jurisdiction: United States of America (Details : {urn:iso:std:iso:3166 code 'US' = 'United States of America', given as 'United States of America'})

tr.td: Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})

ALL HOSPITAL BEDS: Total number of all Inpatient and outpatient beds in your hospital, including all staffed, licensed, and overflow surge or expansion beds used for inpatients or for outpatients (includes ICU beds)
Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})
HOSPITAL INPATIENT BEDS: Total number of staffed inpatient beds in your hospital, including all staffed, licensed, and overflow and surge or expansion beds used for inpatients (includes ICU beds)
Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})
HOSPITAL INPATIENT BED OCCUPANCY: Total number of staffed inpatient beds that are currently occupied
Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})
ICU BEDS: Total number of staffed inpatient intensive care unit (ICU) beds
Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})
ICU BED OCCUPANCY: Total number of staffed inpatient ICU beds that are occupied
Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})
MECHANICAL VENTILATORS: Total number of ventilators available
Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})
MECHANICAL VENTILATORS IN USE: Total number of ventilators in use
Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})
HOSPITALIZED: Patients currently hospitalized in an inpatient bed who have suspected or confirmed COVID-19
Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})
HOSPITALIZED and VENTILATED: Patients currently hospitalized in an inpatient bed who have suspected or confirmed COVID-19 and are on a mechanical ventilator
Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})
HOSPITAL ONSET: Patients currently hospitalized in an inpatient bed with onset of suspected or confirmed COVID-19 fourteen or more days after hospital admission due to a condition other than COVID-19
Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})
ED/OVERFLOW: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who are currently in the Emergency Department (ED) or any overflow location awaiting an inpatient bed
Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})
ED/OVERFLOW and VENTILATED: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who currently are in the ED or any overflow location awaiting an inpatient bed and on a mechanical ventilator
Initial Population (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population', given as 'Initial Population'})
DEATHS: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who died in the hospital, ED or any overflow location on the date for which you are reporting

description.value: CDC, NHSN COVID-19 Patient Impact & Hospital Capacity Hospital Bed/ICU/Ventilator Capacity. The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention’s (CDC’s) National Healthcare Safety Network (NHSN) is supporting the nation’s COVID-19 response by introducing a new COVID-19 Patient Impact and Hospital Capacity Module within NHSN’s Patient Safety Component. https://www.cdc.gov/nhsn/acute-care-hospital/covid19/index.html

display.value: Instructions for Completion of the COVID-19 Patient Impact and Hospital Capacity Module Form (CDC 57.130)
Importing COVID-19 Patient Module Denominator data for Patient Safety Component
COVID-19 Patient Impact & Hospital Capacity Module

description.value: ALL HOSPITAL BEDS: Total number of all Inpatient and outpatient beds in your hospital, including all staffed, licensed, and overflow surge or expansion beds used for inpatients or for outpatients (includes ICU beds)
CDC defined field: numTotBeds

expression.value: Requirement: Optional, Values: 0 to 10000, Format: Must be a whole number, Instruction for Data Collection: Enter the total number of all hospital beds, including inpatient and outpatient beds. All staffed, licensed, and overflow and surge/expansion beds used for inpatients or outpatients. This includes ICU beds.

description.value: HOSPITAL INPATIENT BEDS: Total number of staffed inpatient beds in your hospital, including all staffed, licensed, and overflow and surge or expansion beds used for inpatients (includes ICU beds)
CDC defined field: Numbeds

expression.value: Requirement: Required, Values: 0 to 10000, Format: Must be a whole number Must be <= numTotBeds, Instruction for Data Collection: Required. Enter the total number of all inpatient beds, including all staffed, licensed, and overflow and surge/expansion beds created for inpatient care. This includes intensive care unit (ICU) beds.

description.value: HOSPITAL INPATIENT BED OCCUPANCY: Total number of staffed inpatient beds that are currently occupied
CDC defined field: numBedsOcc

expression.value: Requirement: Optional, Values: 0 to 10000, Format: Must be a whole number Must be <= numBeds, Instruction for Data Collection: Enter the total number of staffed inpatient beds occupied by patients at the time the data is collected, including all staffed, licensed, and overflow and surge/expansion beds created for inpatient care. This includes ICU beds.

description.value: ICU BEDS: Total number of staffed inpatient intensive care unit (ICU) beds
CDC defined field: numICUBeds

expression.value: Requirement: Optional, Values: 0 to 10000, Format: Must be a whole number Must be <= numBeds, Instruction for Data Collection: Enter the total number of staffed Intensive Care Unit (ICU) beds.

description.value: ICU BED OCCUPANCY: Total number of staffed inpatient ICU beds that are occupied
CDC defined field: numICUBedsOcc

expression.value: Requirement: Optional, Values: 0 to 10000, Format: Must be a whole number Must be <= numBeds, Instruction for Data Collection: Enter the total number of staffed ICU beds occupied by patients at the time the data is collected.

description.value: MECHANICAL VENTILATORS: Total number of ventilators available
CDC defined field: numVent

expression.value: Requirement: Optional, Values: 0 to 10000, Format: Must be a whole numbe Must be <= numTotBeds or <= 10,000 , Instruction for Data Collection: Enter the total number of mechanical ventilators, including anesthesia machines and portable/transport ventilators available in the facility. Include BiPAP machines if the hospital uses BiPAP to deliver positive pressure ventilation via artificial airways.

description.value: MECHANICAL VENTILATORS IN USE: Total number of ventilators in use
CDC defined field: numVentUse

expression.value: Requirement: Required, Values: 0 to 10000, Format: Must be a whole number Must be <= numVent or <= 10,000 , Instruction for Data Collection: Required. Enter the total number of mechanical ventilators in use at the time the data is collected, including anesthesia machines and portable/transport ventilators. Include BiPAP machines if the hospital uses BiPAP to deliver positive pressure ventilation via artificial airways.

description.value: HOSPITALIZED: Patients currently hospitalized in an inpatient bed who have suspected or confirmed COVID-19
CDC defined field: nnumC19HospPats

expression.value: Requirement: Optional, Values: 0 to 10000, Format: Must be a whole number Must be <= numBedsOcc, Instruction for Data Collection:Enter the number of patients hospitalized in an inpatient bed at the time the data is collected who have suspected or confirmed COVID-19. This includes the patients with laboratory-confirmed or clinically diagnosed COVID-19. Confirmed: A patient with a laboratoryconfirmed COVID-19 diagnosis. Suspected: A patient without a laboratory confirmed COVID-19 diagnosis who, in accordance with CDC’s Interim Public Health Guidance for Evaluating Persons Under Investigation (PUIs), has signs and symptoms compatible with COVID-19 (most patients with confirmed COVID-19 have developed fever and/or symptoms of acute respiratory illness, such as cough, shortness of breath or myalgia/fatigue).

description.value: HOSPITALIZED and VENTILATED: Patients currently hospitalized in an inpatient bed who have suspected or confirmed COVID-19 and are on a mechanical ventilator
CDC defined field: numC19MechVentPats

expression.value: Requirement: Optional, Values: 0 to 10000, Format: Must be a whole number Must be <= numVentUse, Instruction for Data Collection: Enter the number of patients hospitalized in an inpatient bed who have suspected or confirmed COVID-19 and are currently on a mechanical ventilator* at the time the data is collected . This includes the patients with laboratory-confirmed or clinically diagnosed COVID-19. *Ventilator: Any device used to support, assist or control respiration (inclusive of the weaning period) through the application of positive pressure to the airway when delivered via an artificial airway, specifically an oral/nasal endotracheal or tracheostomy tube. Note: Ventilation and lung expansion devices that deliver positive pressure to the airway (for example: CPAP, BiPAP, bi-level, IPPB and PEEP) via non-invasive means (for example: nasal prongs, nasal mask, full face mask, total mask, etc.) are not considered ventilators unless positive pressure is delivered via an artificial airway (oral/nasal endotracheal or tracheostomy tube).

description.value: HOSPITAL ONSET: Patients currently hospitalized in an inpatient bed with onset of suspected or confirmed COVID-19 fourteen or more days after hospital admission due to a condition other than COVID-19
CDC defined field: numC19HOPats

expression.value: Requirement: Optional, Values: 0 to 10000, Format: Must be a whole number Must be <= numBedsOcc, Instruction for Data Collection: Enter the number of patients hospitalized in an inpatient bed at the time the data is collected with onset of suspected or confirmed COVID-19 fourteen or more days after hospitalization (admission date = hospital day 1). This includes laboratory-confirmed or clinically diagnosed COVID-19 cases.

description.value: ED/OVERFLOW: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who are currently in the Emergency Department (ED) or any overflow location awaiting an inpatient bed
CDC defined field: numC19OverflowPats

expression.value: Requirement: Optional, Values: 0 to 2000, Format: Must be a whole number Must be <= 2000, Instruction for Data Collection: Enter the number of patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who are in the Emergency Department(ED) or any overflow/expansion location awaiting placement in an inpatient bed at the time the data is collected . This includes patients with laboratory-confirmed or clinically diagnosed COVID-19. Overflow locations include any physical locations created to accommodate patients include but not limited to 24-hour observation units, hallways, parking lots, or tents

description.value: ED/OVERFLOW and VENTILATED: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who currently are in the ED or any overflow location awaiting an inpatient bed and on a mechanical ventilator
CDC defined field: nnumC19OFMechVentPats

expression.value: Requirement: Optional, Values: 0 to 10000, Format: Must be a whole number Must be <= numVentUse, Instruction for Data Collection: Enter the number of patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who are in the ED or any overflow/expansion location on a mechanical ventilator* at the time the data is collected . This includes patients with laboratory-confirmed or clinically diagnosed COVID-19. *Ventilator: Any device used to support, assist or control respiration (inclusive of the weaning period) through the application of positive pressure to the airway when delivered via an artificial airway, specifically an oral/nasal endotracheal or tracheostomy tube. Note: Ventilation and lung expansion devices that deliver positive pressure to the airway (for example: CPAP, BiPAP, bi-level, IPPB and PEEP) via non-invasive means (for example: nasal prongs, nasal mask, full face mask, total mask, etc.) are not considered ventilators unless positive pressure is delivered via an artificial airway (oral/nasal endotracheal or tracheostomy tube).

description.value: DEATHS: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who died in the hospital, ED or any overflow location on the date for which you are reporting
CDC defined field: numC19Died

expression.value: Requirement: Optional, Values: 0 to 1500, Format: Must be a whole number Must be <= 1500, Instruction for Data Collection: Enter the number of patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who died in the hospital, ED, or any overflow location. This includes patients with laboratory-confirmed or clinically diagnosed COVID-19. Please enter the count of deaths newly occurred, at the time the data is collected instead of the cumulated number of deaths.
